lead_paragraph: While many players bemoan the short turnaround between the British Open and PGA Championship, jammed closer together to accommodate the Rio Olympics golf tournament, the implacable Dustin Johnson just rolls on.

headline.print_headline: Johnson Sees Another Promising Major Chance at Baltusrol
headline.main: Johnson Sees Another Promising Major Chance at Baltusrol

snippet: While many players bemoan the short turnaround between the British Open and PGA Championship, jammed closer together to accommodate the Rio Olympics golf tournament, the implacable Dustin Johnson just rolls on....
